SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Card
A class to make a card, for use in the game.
CardEffects
Interface for the sole purpose of setting up cards, which each card type will be defined in its own class, therefore implementing this interface.
CardLevel
Enum utilized to determine a card's level.
CardTypes
Types of possible cards, also helps to set the effect types.
Deck
Class that establishes a deck, for use in the user hand and the overall deck of cards that will be drawn from.
EffectTypes
Types of effects
GUIController
 
JavaClient
This class implements the java socket client
JavaServer
This class implements java Socket server
LocationCard
Card that establishes a location.
Main
Main file, executes the game.
RemovalCard
Card type that removes cards, in a generic fashion, implemented to possible remove from deck, or user.
RevealCard
Card that reveals cards in deck/other player's hand.
SomeRequest
 
SomeResponse
 
TrashDiscard
 
TurnStates
Enum for the purpose of controlling the turns
UpgradeCard
Upgrades another card.
User
Class to establish a user's identity invalid input: '&' hand.
VFXMethods
Methods to control JavaFX.
